title: Finance_360
description: Financial data from various sources, enabling a comprehensive view of financial transactions and investments.

bank_transactions.title: Bank Transactions
bank_transactions.description: Contains detailed bank transaction information, including transaction dates, amounts, and transaction types.

workflow.title: Bank Transactions Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and analyzing bank transaction data.

investment_portfolio.title: Investment Portfolio
investment_portfolio.description: Stores information about investment portfolios, including asset allocation, holdings, and market values.

workflow.title: Investment Portfolio Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow for processing and managing investment portfolio data.

lens.name: Finance Insights Lens
lens.description: Provides insights into financial transactions and investment performance.

compute_cluster.title: Compute Cluster
compute_cluster.description: Utilized for large-scale data processing and analytics tasks.

message_broker.title: Message Broker
message_broker.description: Facilitates real-time data streaming and event processing.

details.broker_instance_type: Instance type with at least 8 CPU cores and 32 GB RAM per broker

python.title: Python
python.description: Utilized for data processing, analysis, and scripting tasks.

spark.title: Apache Spark
spark.description: Used for distributed data processing and analytics at scale.

kafka.title: Apache Kafka
kafka.description: Deployed for real-time data streaming and event-driven architectures.

technical_specifications.title: Finance 360 Lens
technical_specifications.description: Empowers financial institutions with comprehensive insights for informed decision-making.

features.investment_analysis: Perform detailed analysis of investment portfolios to optimize returns and manage risks.
features.transaction_monitoring: Monitor financial transactions in real-time to detect anomalies and fraudulent activities.

investment_management.title: Investment Management
investment_management.description: Optimize investment portfolios and asset allocations to maximize returns while managing risks.

risk_analysis.title: Risk Analysis
risk_analysis.description: Identify, assess, and mitigate financial risks to protect assets and ensure business continuity.
